title: Interdisciplinary Approaches for Developing Mathematics Instructional Design Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen instructional design competencies specialized in mathematics curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can analyze creative design methodologies applied across various disciplines (architecture, engineering, art, etc.) and adapt them to mathematics instructional design
Learners can perform innovative mathematics lesson design through interdisciplinary approaches to overcome limitations of existing instructional design models
Learners can continuously improve the effectiveness of mathematics learning materials and activities using formative assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
